overview: A bee flies out from the "blooming flower" dynamic wallpaper of the smartphone, and then flies into the front camera of the phone. After that, the bee flies in the operation interface of the phone and finally flies out from the rear camera. The director structures the film in the way of association, by building up an orange indoor space and imaginatively processing images of "flowers", "snow mountain" and "orange", which are derived from the smartphone UI.
title: Orange, Bee, and Snow Mountain
